32.name: Griffon Slayer
32.description: Hunting these formidable beasts has been a Tyrian pastime for centuries.

95.name: Human Specialty Armors
95.description: Superior garb in honor of your achievements.
95.requirement: Soulbind  unique piece of human cultural armor.

140.name: Hunter Gatherer
140.description: No stone left unturned. No tree left unpruned.

152.name: Hint Completion
152.description: An informed adventurer, ready to take on the world.

445.name: Monthly Completionist
445.description: You completed your daily category multiple times in a month.
445.requirement: Complete the daily achievement category  times in a month.

476.name: Shiverpeaks Killer
476.requirement: Kill foes that grant experience in the following Shiverpeak Mountains maps: Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, and Frostgorge Sound.

492.name: Keg Brawl Victor
492.requirement: Defeat your opposing team in the Hoelbrak keg brawl.

597.name: Southsun Camp Sample Collection
597.description: Collect a sample near Levvi's research camp at Canach's Folly.

678.name: Unfriendly Skies
678.requirement: Use Aetherblade weaponry to bring down the pirate airship.

679.name: Don't Be Rude to the Brute

714.name: Kites of Iron
714.requirement: Find the large kite hidden in Pig Iron Quarry in Fireheart Rise.

734.name: Kiel: Direct Support
734.requirement: Complete Tiers 1 and 2 of Ellen Kiel's candidate trials.

840.name: Daily Watchwork Wrecker
840.requirement: Defeat 25 of Scarlet's twisted watchwork minions.

875.name: Bachelor of Baubles, World 2
875.requirement: Collect every World 2, Zone 2 bauble in one playthrough. Baubles from foes aren't counted.

885.name: Here Be Dragons!
885.requirement: Participate in the Tequatl encounter  times.

899.name: Hunt the Dragon!
899.requirement: Search for  clues of dragons in Frostgorge Sound.

926.name: Above and Beyond
926.requirement: Help the Lionguard take the Aetherblade base by completing all optional events in one run.

969.name: Mists Invasion Defender
969.requirement: Defeat enemy invaders in the Mists.

997.name: WvW Premier Season: 7th Place
997.requirement: Win your league in a WvW Season.

998.name: WvW Premier Season: 8th Place
998.requirement: Win your league in a WvW Season.

1024.name: Jumping Mad
1024.requirement: Complete the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower jumping puzzles.

1100.name: Nightmare Ender
1100.requirement: Assist Marjoy and Kasmeer in "The Nightmare Ends" story instance in Kessex Hills.

1197.name: Aetherblade Captain Stabilizer
1197.description: Mai tried, but Trin didn't win.
1197.requirement: You've completed the Captain Mai Trin boss fractal inside the Fractals of the Mists.

1205.name: Aftermath Shock Wave Jumper
1205.requirement: Avoid the toxic wurm queen's shock waves by jumping over them.

1213.name: Aftermath Toxic Alliance Slayer I
1213.requirement: Kill  members of the Toxic Alliance.

1256.name: Snowball Mayhem Participant
1256.description: Your hands must be freezing by now.

1350.name: Boss Thumper XXVIII
1350.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1359.name: Boss Thumper XIX
1359.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1382.name: Blades in the Mists
1382.requirement: Kill Aetherblades in the Edge of the Mists.

1459.name: Wurmicidal Maniac
1459.requirement: Successfully decapitate the great jungle wurm in Bloodtide Coast and defeat all three of its heads (does not count toward Triple Trouble meta-achievement).

1515.name: Out with a Bang
1515.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1515.requirement: Defeat the Champion Molten Munitions Specialist.

1578.name: Flame Legion Finisher
1578.requirement: Kill  Flame Legionnaire in the Crown Pavilion.

1646.name: No Shocks Here
1646.description: Story Instance: Disturbance in Brisban Wildlands
1646.requirement: Don't get hit by projectiles from Static Discharge.

1696.name: Heist Hinderer
1696.requirement: Prevented skritts from raiding supplies from Zephyrites in Challenger Cliffs.

1845.name: Daily WvW Keep Capturer
1845.requirement: Capture a keep for your realm in World vs. World.

1886.name: Daily Chaos Crystal Cavern Jumping Puzzle
1886.requirement: Complete the Chaos Crystal Cavern jumping puzzle in Iron Marches.

1917.name: Daily Under New Management Jumping Puzzle
1917.requirement: Complete the Under New Management jumping puzzle in Southsun Cove.

1934.name: Daily Inquest Golem Mark II
1934.requirement: Defeat the Inquest Golem Mark II on the Whitland Flats in Mount Maelstrom.

2075.name: Dragon Ball Champion
2075.description: Count yourself among the elite of the Dragon Ball.

2105.name: Daily Guardian or Elementalist Winner
2105.requirement: Win  PvP match as a guardian or elementalist.

2276.name: Shooting Gallery: Gold
2276.requirement: Shoot as many target dummies as you can before time runs out!

2281.name: Ground Pounder
2281.requirement: Complete all 5 outposts in the Verdant Brink.

2348.name: Wild Dragon Chase
2348.requirement: While being pursued by the Mordrem beast, find and retrieve all 23 Echoes of Glint.

2422.name: Daily Recommended Fractal—Scale 8
2422.requirement: Complete  scale 8 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2435.name: Bugs in the Branches: Silver
2435.requirement: Jump and glide to collect bugs before time runs out!

2462.name: The Longest Glide
2462.requirement: Glide from the Mordrem migration path in SCAR Field Operations all the way to Dragon's Passage.

2470.name: Revenant: Corruption
2470.requirement: Complete the Corruption revenant specialization to unlock the Mistward Warboots collection.

2607.name: A Fungus Among Us: Gold
2607.requirement: Bounce your way through the checkpoints and across the finish line!

2624.name: "Thunderbreaker" Strongbox
2624.requirement: Search in the Noble Ledges area for the strongbox from the "Thunderbreaker."

2675.name: League Mesmer—Veteran
2675.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Veteran achievement.
2675.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a mesmer.

2688.name: League Thief—Elite
2688.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Elite achievement.
2688.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as a thief.

2703.name: League Revenant—Champion
2703.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Champion achievement.
2703.requirement: Win 7 ranked matches as a revenant.

2726.name: League Guardian—Veteran
2726.description: Completing this achievement advances the League Profession—Veteran achievement.
2726.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as a guardian.

2735.name: Daily League Participator—Elite
2735.description: Completing this achievement awards an item for Path of the Ascension IV: Hymn of Glory.
2735.requirement: Increments each day after playing in 3 ranked matches.

2737.name: Mystic Essence Collector—Recruit
2737.description: Completing this achievement advances the meta-achievement Path of the Ascension I: The Thrill of Battle.
2737.requirement: Obtain by combining the following items in the Mystic Forge: Essence of Determination, 20 Vials of Powerful Blood, 50 Vials of Potent Blood, and 250 Piles of Bloodstone Dust.

2773.name: Wrapping Everywhere
2773.description: Only one way to find out what's inside.

2792.name: Connoisseur of Confection
2792.description: Be careful about eating too much at once; those sugar crashes can be painful.

2854.name: Adventuring 101
2854.requirement: Complete World 1, Zone 1 of Super Adventure Box.

2915.name: Daily Adventure: Fallen Masks
2915.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

2932.name: Daily Tier 4 Captain Mai Trin Boss
2932.requirement: Complete Captain Mai Trin Boss at fractal scale 76 or higher.

3054.name: Research in Rata Novus
3054.description: Journal: Research in Rata Novus Completed
3054.requirement: Visit Taimi in Rata Novus, as requested.

3113.name: Tablets of the Unseen
3113.description: "The mursaat are an important piece of Tyrian history."—Magister Ela Makkay
3113.requirement: Read the mursaat tablets scattered around their old fortress.

3193.name: Frozen in Ice
3193.requirement: Infiltrate the Svanir to discover how they survive Jormag's bitter cold.

3210.name: The Bitter Cold
3210.requirement: Enter the Bitter Cold, and then find and kill the abomination for Taimi's sample.

3245.name: Snowball Mayhem
3245.description: Celebrate one of Tyria's oldest winter traditions.
3245.requirement: Win a round of Snowball Mayhem.

3283.name: Skyhammer Defender
3283.requirement: Defeat  enemy while defending your team's capture points during Skyhammer rated matches.

3307.name: Silent Storm Assaulter
3307.requirement: Neutralize  enemy capture point during Temple of the Silent Storm rated matches.

3376.name: Niflhel Assaulter
3376.requirement: Neutralize  enemy capture point during Forest of Niflhel rated matches.

3382.name: Champion's Call
3382.description: Will the champions answer your call to battle?
3382.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that summons a champion in Battle of Champion's Dusk rated matches  time.

3609.name: Freezing Leap
3609.requirement: Use diving goggles to jump from the top of the highest waterfall.

3635.name: Dress Rehearsal
3635.description: <c=@Flavor>The rich fabrics and detailed patterns found throughout the Crystal Desert speak to the mix of cultures and nations that have called this land their home. </c>
3635.requirement: Recover all  Elonian armor pieces through completing the Personal Story.

3713.name: Desert Highlands Insight: Sunderlands Crater
3713.requirement: Discover this Crystal Desert Mastery Insight in the Desert Highlands.

3756.name: Expurgation
3756.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the firebrand's axe, Expurgation.
3756.locked_text: Begin training the guardian's firebrand elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the guardian's firebrand elite specialization.
Drops from harpies in the Crystal Desert.
Purchased from Priest Hakim at the Temple of Kormir in Crystal Oasis.
As a guardian, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin, in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for Uussh Visshta in Destiny's Gorge in the Crystal Oasis.
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as a guardian in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Help Explorer Jeppa recover lost supplies above Brightwater Inlet in the Desert Highlands.
Explore Skyward Reach in the Elon Riverlands with your jackal.
Drops for guardians from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Completely train the guardian's firebrand elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as a guardian.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3806.name: Dune Rider
3806.requirement: Unlock the raptor mount by completing the Seeker's Village task region in Crystal Oasis, and by purchasing a raptor saddle from Aksim.

3848.name: Guerrilla Arc
3848.requirement: Collect these  items and skins to receive the renegade's short bow, Guerrilla Arc.
3848.locked_text: Begin training the revenant's renegade elite specialization.

bits.text: Begin training the revenant's renegade elite specialization.
Drops from cats in the Crystal Desert.
Purchased from Tariq Ayim near Bonestrand Garrison in the Desolation.
As a revenant, use a Mystic Coin in the wishing well in the Garden of Seborhin, in the Domain of Vabbi.
Complete the bounty for the Forged Proliferator in Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Purchased from Keeper Pamir at Torment's Watch in the Desolation.
Complete a race event as a revenant in any Crystal Desert map.
Found when identifying gear, or purchased from the Black Lion Trading Post.
Help Erran and Second Spear Olishar storm the Deadhouse in the Elon Riverlands.
Explore Sand Jackal Run in the Desolation with your jackal.
Drops for revenants from caffeinated skritt in any Crystal Desert map.
Completely train the revenant's renegade elite specialization.
Earn map complete on any Crystal Desert map as a revenant.
Craft with recipes purchased in the Desolation or the Domain of Vabbi.

3867.name: Open Skies: On Wings and a Prayer
3867.description: Come, hero, and reclaim the skies for the Sunspears. For us, reclaim Elona.
3867.requirement: Return the Writings of the Last Spearmarshal to the pedestal in the sanctuary.

bits.text: Collect all 10 volumes of the Writings of the Last Spearmarshal from Kormir's sanctum.
Place the Writings of the Last Spearmarshal on the pedestal in the Sunspear sanctuary.

3908.name: Seeker of Truth and Knowledge
3908.requirement: Find and read all available books and scrolls in Kormir's library.

bits.text: The Sunspear Creed: On a book stand.
Scriptures of Kormir: On a book stand.
Book of Secrets: On a book stand.
Journal: Top floor of the library. Requires discovering Untitled Volume before reading.
The Artist's Mirror: How Art Reflects Society: Found on the ground floor.
We, Too, Can Be Vessels of Knowledge and Truth: Found on the ground floor.
Poems by Danna, Age 9: Found on the top floor.
Magic and War: An Educated Warning: On a lower level, but only reachable by mount.
Journal of Kormir: Found in the hidden room.
Untitled Volume: Found in the hidden room.
Palace of Bones: The Centaur Tragedy: Found in the hidden room.
The Goddess and the Scourge: Found in the hidden room.
Turai's Story: Found in the hidden room.
The First City: Found in the hidden room.
Treacherous Waters: Found in the hidden room.
Speak with the Goddess of Truth and Knowledge.

3933.name: Against the King
3933.requirement: Survive Mad King Thorn's tricks in the Ascent to Madness mission.

3987.name: Daily Domain of Istan Corpse Caravan Disruptor
3987.requirement: Disrupt three corpse caravans in the Domain of Istan.

3992.name: Unfinished Business
3992.description: Could you please just stay dead this time?
3992.requirement: Kill Archon Iberu during the raid on Palawadan.

3995.name: Lost to Time
3995.description: These must have been buried a loooooong time ago.
3995.requirement: Find all Sunspear caches buried around the island.

4033.name: Necro Dancer
4033.description: There will be only ruined flesh and powdered bone where you now stand.
4033.requirement: Defeat the Soulless Horror without being hit by Vortex Slash.

4059.name: (Annual) Leaping Above the Snow
4059.requirement: Complete the Winter Wonderland jumping puzzle  time during Wintersday. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4133.name: Sandswept Isles Legendary Hunter
4133.requirement: Defeat each legendary bounty in the Sandswept Isles at least once.

4141.name: Rebooting IG-6417
4141.requirement: Download the software needed to repair IG-6417.

bits.text: Download the software module from an Inquest terminal and use it to update the software for IG-6417.
Download the software module from an Inquest terminal and use it to update the software for IG-6417.
Download the software module from an Inquest terminal and use it to update the software for IG-6417.
Download the software module from an Inquest terminal and use it to update the software for IG-6417.
Download the software module from an Inquest terminal and use it to update the software for IG-6417.
Download the software module from an Inquest terminal and use it to update the software for IG-6417.
Download the software module from an Inquest terminal and use it to update the software for IG-6417.
Find a passcode from the Inquest in Sandswept Isles in order to log in to their terminals.

4174.name: Master Diver: Gendarran Fields
4174.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
4174.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Gendarran Fields.

4434.name: Big Bluffs Hunter
4434.requirement: Track down and defeat the rarely sighted enemies throughout the map.

4452.name: (Annual) A Royal Tradition
4452.requirement: Impress Mad King Thorn with your obedience in a round of Mad King Says. Achievement can be completed once every year.

4572.name: Curse Catcher
4572.requirement: In the Siren's Reef fractal, catch 8 bags of cursed treasure while navigating the maze.

4599.name: Chasing Tales: Immovable Object
4599.description: "Go on. Give it your best shot. I'll wait."
4599.requirement: Block, absorb, or reflect 20 attacks while wielding a shield.

bits.text: Blocked, absorbed, or reflected 20 attacks while wielding a shield in Thunderhead Peaks.

4614.name: Chasing Tales: Tools of the Trade
4614.description: Mirren's skill with scepter and focus was formidable indeed.
4614.requirement: Defeat 60 enemies while wielding a scepter and a focus in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 60 enemies while wielding a scepter and a focus in Thunderhead Peaks.

4635.name: Fish Out of Water
4635.requirement: Let your warclaw touch the water.

4644.name: Officially Uninvited
4644.requirement: Use the warclaw's Chain Pull skill to damage gates in WvW.

4725.name: Skyscale Treats
4725.requirement: Defeat creatures around the world to find treats, and feed them to your skyscale.

bits.text: Defeat karka to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat sand lions to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat iboga to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat desert insects to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat jacaranda to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat sand eels to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat rock gazelles to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat sand sharks to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat bats to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat skale to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat skelk to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat spiders to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat minotaurs to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.
Defeat wyverns to obtain a treat for your skyscale. More likely to drop from champions.

4775.name: Mystic Forge "Researcher"
4775.requirement: Donate goods to the "very scientific" research into the Mystic Forge's secrets in Lion's Arch.

4870.name: (Annual) Centaur Crusher
4870.requirement: Kill  centaur in the Crown Pavilion. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4876.name: Annual Customs
4876.requirement: Complete the (Annual) Four Winds Customs achievement. This achievement can only be completed once per year.

4878.name: (Annual) Bundle Plunderer
4878.requirement: Plunder 250 bundles of loot during the Labyrinthine Cliffs treasure hunt. This achievement can be completed once every year.

bits.text: Cook a Bowl of Snow Truffle Soup while Reimar watches.
Cook a Sesame-Roasted Dinner while Reimar watches.
Cook Sage-Stuffed Poultry while Reimar watches.
Provide Deldrimor Steel Ingots to Einar Blackforge.
Provide Dragonite Ingots to Einar Blackforge.
Provide a Spiritwood Plank to Einar Blackforge.
Return to Einar after his work is complete.
Cook a Filet of Rosemary-Roasted Meat while Bhia watches.
Cook a Bowl of Artichoke Soup while Bhia watches.
Cook a Bowl of Poultry Tarragon Pasta while Bhia watches.
Learn varietal-seed harvesting from Mender Earie in the Grove.
Harvest varietal seeds from herb nodes across Tyria.
Craft a portable composter and bring it to Mender Earie.
Acquire a garden plot for your home instance from Mender Earie.
Cook a Bowl of Spicy Meat Chili while Gurges Burnpaw watches.
Cook a Plate of Lemongrass Poultry while Gurges Burnpaw watches.
Cook a Plate of Fire Flank Steak while Gurges Burnpaw watches.
Observe Vaastas Meatslayer butchering a cow.
Practice your new butchering techniques on creatures that drop Slabs of Red Meat.
Practice your new butchering techniques on creatures that drop Slabs of Poultry Meat.
Return to Vaastas Meatslayer to learn his recipes.
Cook a Bowl of Roasted Lotus Root while Sage watches.
Cook a Flatbread while Sage watches.
Cook a Chocolate Omnomberry Cake while Sage watches.
Bring Heat Stones to Luron the Baker.
Enhance your Heat Stones in a pool of boiling-hot magma at Mount Maelstrom.
Provide Luron the Baker with Bloodstone Bricks.
Return to your home instance to receive your new oven.
Cook a Bowl of Tropical Mousse while Prazz watches.
Cook a Bowl of Truffle Sautee while Prazz watches.
Cook an Omnomberry Ghost while Prazz watches.
Purchase this license from Gastronome Plikk.
Cuts of Quality Red Meat can be looted after learning charr butchery techniques, or they can be purchased via the Trading Post.
Purchase this license from Gastronome Plikk.
Purchase this license from Gastronome Plikk.

4946.name: Pepper Picker
4946.requirement: Collect 200 Hatched Chilis in Grothmar Valley.

4962.name: Grothmar Skyscale Challenge: Silver
4962.requirement: Prove your mastery over the skyscale in Grothmar Valley.

4969.name: Daily Grothmar Valley Field Assistant
4969.requirement: Complete one of the Iron forge, Rusty Meadows, or Kasmeer event chains around Grothmar Valley.

5015.name: Daily Kodan Helping Paw
5015.requirement: Help the kodan by completing events in West Bjora Marches.

5099.name: Deathless Hunt
5099.requirement: Defeat the Boneskinner in the Sanctum Arena without being downed or defeated.

5248.name: Intel Acquired
5248.requirement: Find all pieces of intelligence inside the secret base.

5275.name: Fast Purrsuit
5275.description:
Story Instance: Turnabout

Where do you think you're going?
5275.requirement: End the pursuit within the time limit.

5284.name: Stormcaller Armsmaster
5284.requirement: Unlock all recipes to craft the Stormcaller Armaments.

5327.name: Glory to the Ash Legion
5327.requirement:
Collect Charr Commendations for the legions by defeating Dominion forces and accomplishing objectives in the Drizzlewood Coast.
Speak with a quaestor in any allied base to change which legion your commendations go to.

5347.name: Special Mission: Must Have Been the Wind
5347.requirement: Escape from enemies  times using Ash Legion Mount Stealth.

5368.name: Special Mission: Shoot to Thrill
5368.requirement: Apply offensive boons to  allies with the Medizooka.

5666.name: Forger of Draconic Fire
5666.requirement: Unlock all recipes to craft the Fiery Dragon Slayer weapons.

5688.name: Tide Turner: Bloodtide Coast
5688.requirement: During the Dragon Response Mission, aid each recruited faction at least once while a challenge is active.

5712.name: League Slayer—2v2 Season Four
5712.requirement: Defeat  players in ranked matches during 2v2 Season Four.

5736.name: Return to Frozen Out
5736.requirement: Complete the mission Frozen Out in Living World Season 3 Episode 3.

5797.name: Return to Eir's Memorial in Hoelbrak
5797.requirement: Complete the mission Eir's Memorial in Hoelbrak in Living World Season 3 Episode 1.

5845.name: Wrath of the Twisted Marionette Avenger
5845.requirement: Defeat the Twisted Marionette during the Wrath of the Twisted Marionette bonus event to help stabilize the Mists and contribute to the global event!

5895.name: Return to The Crystal Dragon
5895.requirement: Complete the story mission The Crystal Dragon in Living World Season 4 Episode 5.

5934.name: Return to Dragonstorm
5934.requirement: Complete the story mission Dragonstorm in Living World Icebrood Saga Episode 5.

5979.name: Treasure Hunter: Thunderhead Peaks
5979.requirement: Open  dwarven chests within Thunderhead Peaks.

6039.name: Court Duty: Terror of the Tower
6039.requirement: Open chests in the Mad King's Clock Tower or Stopped Clock Tower jumping puzzles. Chests higher up the tower award extra progress.

6237.name: Bloodhound
6237.requirement: Hunt down every lead in the Aetherblade investigation.

6243.name: Kaineng Overlook
6243.requirement: Complete the Kaineng Overlook Strike Mission.

6330.name: Ascalonian Fisher
6330.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6330.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of Ascalon.

6472.name: Cultures of Echovald: The Wardens
6472.requirement: Participate in all the events related to the Wardens.

bits.text: Prevent the Speaker defector from dying so that she can foil Igne Mossheart.
Protect the Speaker defector as she removes Igne Mossheart's wards.
Disrupt Igne Mossheart's followers before they can complete their vile ritual.
Defeat Igne Mossheart before he can complete his vile ritual.

6485.name: Ministry-Approved Virtuoso
6485.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6489.name: Ring of Fire Fisher
6489.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6489.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around the Ring of Fire.

6509.name: Avid Desert Fisher
6509.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6509.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of the Crystal Desert and the Elonian mainland.

6558.name: The Facet of Shadow and Death
6558.requirement: Unlock all legendary Zhaitan weapon variants.

6636.name: Reviving Allies
6636.requirement:
Revive  ally.

<c=@reminder>Downed or defeated players and allies can be revived by approaching and interacting with them to restore their health. Multiple people can revive the same ally at once to restore health faster.</c>

6794.name: Please Follow Me to the Exit Again
6794.description: Story Instance: Escape from Lion's Arch
6794.requirement: Find and rescue all 6 hidden evacuees.

6799.name: Investigative Record 3
6799.requirement: Find and listen to hidden logs from the source of the madness.

6801.name: Lions Rampant 2
6801.requirement: Complete events during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

6839.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Thirty-Six
6839.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Six.

6880.name: Ongoing Investigations: The Jade Brotherhood
6880.requirement: Listen to all of Yao's and the Jade Brotherhood research consultant's audio logs.

6882.name: Documenter of Secrets, Under 3
6882.requirement: Find all the red baubles in the World 3 Test Zone.

6905.name: New Kaineng Jade Bot Racer: Gold
6905.requirement: Complete the New Kaineng Jade Bot Racer adventure with a gold rating.

6926.name: Gyala Delve Siege Turtle Ace: Gold
6926.requirement: Complete the Gyala Delve Siege Turtle adventure with a gold rating.

6933.name: Mists Research
6933.description: Discover a mysterious power made of Mists energy.
6933.requirement: Investigate places of power in the Mists.

bits.text: Investigate the Krait Reliquary in Darkrait Inlet.
Investigate the Dredge Furnace in Molevekian Delve.
Investigate the Harpy Nesting Grounds in Orgath Uplands.
Investigate the Heart of Stone inside Stonemist Castle.
Investigate the Centaur Totem in the Spiritholme.
Investigate the Skritt Shiny in the Titanpaw.
Investigate the Mysterious Energy in Darra's Maze.

6947.name: The Fearless Few
6947.requirement: Complete the Silent Surf fractal without getting struck by the final boss's Dread Visage attack.

6986.name: Tangled Depths Rift Hunting
6986.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Tangled Depths.

6994.name: Wizard's Tower Diving Goggles
6994.description: Wizards have to relax too you know!
6994.requirement: Take a plunge off the high dive in the Wizard's Tower.

7014.name: Secrets of the Obscure: Act 3 Mastery
7014.requirement: Complete  Secrets of the Obscure: Act 3 achievements.

7035.name: Nourish Natural
7035.description: "Darling, a pinch too much sand lotus and that concoction will spoil in your hands."
7035.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of the Natural.

bits.text: Help Zizel prepare concoctions for the fight against the Kryptis.
Help Forro with returning the possessed creatures to the pens.
Help Narcisse exorcise the possessed plants and calm them down.

7053.name: Illuminating Amnytas
7053.description: In the darkest depths of night, unite the stars and bring forth the light.
7053.requirement: Transfer power to  lanterns at points of interest in Amnytas. These lanterns will only appear after 100% map exploration.

bits.text: Museum of Curiosities: Hall of Giants

7089.name: Mabon's Fate
7089.requirement: Assist the wizards in trying to track down and rescue Mabon before it's too late.

7136.name: Crate Keeper
7136.description: If they just asked nicely, maybe they would get what they wanted.
7136.requirement: At Jade Mech Habitation Zone 03: Protect all three crates from being destroyed by the naga during a single event.

7248.name: Stargaze Ridge Skyscale Ride
7248.description: Skyscale dodges can cover a good amount of distance if you need a little boost.
7248.requirement: Ride a skyscale from the top of the dome on Stargaze Ridge to the tower in western Primal Maguuma in under 2 minutes without dismounting or teleporting.

7342.name: Deputized for Dungeons
7342.requirement: Speak with Lady Camilla at Fort Marriner during the Dungeon Rush event.

7659.name: Desert Highlands Incursions
7659.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Desert Highlands.

7661.name: Auric Basin Rift Hunting
7661.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Auric Basin.

7697.name: Dry Top Rift Hunting
7697.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Dry Top.

7744.name: Thundercrag Weapon Collection
7744.requirement: Unlock all  Thundercrag weapon skins in your wardrobe.

7793.name: A Record of War: Strength
7793.requirement: Complete various tasks throughout Nayos and earn the banner of the Bastion of Strength.

bits.text: Defeat the champion Avatar of Envy in Nyedra.

7933.name: Revenge of the Canopy Bosses
7933.requirement: During nightfall in Verdant Brink, defeat one of the canopy boss enemies.

7936.name: Super Bow
7936.requirement: Purchase the Bow in the World 3 Test Zone.

7989.name: Gape into the Abyss
7989.description: "I SALUTE your efforts. That's why I sell these astral fluctuating masses. No slick-talking 'special deals' from me—wouldn't want to UPSET you, unlike that junior archivist." — Gharr
7989.requirement:
Open  astral fluctuating masses.

(These can be purchased from Gharr Leadclaw in the Wizard's Tower. Requires Wayfinder Mastery.)
7989.locked_text: Requires training the Wayfinder Mastery to unlock.

8021.name: Desperate Measures
8021.requirement: Meet with your allies and prepare to assault Zakiros.

8049.name: Convergence Challenge Mode: Master
8049.description: No creature too legendary, no challenge too...challenging.
8049.requirement: Earn gold rank in Convergences with challenge mode active for all legendary creatures.

8114.name: Sunken Treasure Week: Bloodtide Coast
8114.description: This chest can be reopened once per week or per completion of the Master Diver achievement.
8114.requirement: Find and open the sunken chest in Bloodtide Coast.

8121.name: Second Dive: Cold Feet (Weekly)
8121.requirement: Find and use a diving location in the Bitter Cold.

8134.name: Unbound Guardian's Revenge (Weekly)
8134.requirement: Defeat the Unbound Guardian deep within the Cavern of Unseen Lights.

8136.name: Reconquering Abaddon's Ascent (Weekly)
8136.requirement: Reach the top of the tower.

8276.name: No Stranger to Success
8276.requirement: Defeat the stranger's spawn without dying.

8308.name: Janthir Syntri Insight: Bloodtree's Reach
8308.requirement: Discover this Janthir Wilds Mastery Insight in Janthir Syntri.

8348.name: Event Collection: Southwest Janthir Syntri
8348.requirement:
Participate in successful events around Moldering Greenwood, Festering Basin, and Slithering Outskirts.

(Some events can count toward multiple achievements.)

bits.text: Use your gathering tools to help Gleaning Copse clear rotting plants and enemies.
Clear the infestation of Greer grubs.
Collect affected flora samples for Curious Remedy's research. (Event 1 of 2)
Protect the plant while Curious Remedy's therapeutic cleanses the rot. (Event 2 of 2)

8385.name: Daily Domain of Istan
8385.requirement: Complete  events in Domain of Istan.

8400.name: Revenge of Archon Iberu (Weekly)
8400.requirement: Kill Archon Iberu during the raid on Palawadan.

8422.name: Renowned Hero: Domain of Istan (Weekly)
8422.requirement: Complete renown hearts in the Domain of Istan.

8495.name: Catapult Expertise
8495.requirement: Damage walls 50 times with a catapult.

8515.name: League Conqueror—Conquest Season Forty-Four
8515.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Forty-Four.

8521.name: Return to the Icebrood Saga
8521.requirement: Complete  achievements from the Return to the Icebrood Saga event.

8633.name: Home Sweet Homestead: The Desolation
8633.description: Look at that—it's a homestead party!
8633.requirement:
Complete events in the Desolation. Group events will award more progress.

Earn bonus progress by completing the "Reach the finish line" event in Sand Jackal Run.

8727.name: International Cuisine
8727.requirement: Sample all of the dishes at the buffet while attending the Tyrian Alliance's celebration.

8786.name: Returning to Horn of Maguuma
8786.requirement: Meet with R'tchikk and Gladium in the Wizard's Tower to learn about the Return to Secrets of the Obscure event.
